ru.jango.j0loader

Class ParamedLoader<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.jango.j0loader.DataLoader<T>
      • ru.jango.j0loader.ParamedLoader<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - after postprocessing of the loaded data an object of type T will be created and passed into DataLoader.LoadingListener.processFinished(Request, byte[], Object)
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JSONLoader

    public abstract class ParamedLoader<T>
extends DataLoader<T>
    Parametrized loader. A loader, witch allows not only to download data, but also to upload it. Parameters for sending should be backed as a List<Param> and passed inside a Request object.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class ru.jango.j0loader.DataLoader

        protected void writeEntities(Request request,
                 java.io.OutputStream out,
                 java.util.ArrayList<byte[]> entities,
                 long totalBytes)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Write entities into specified OutputStream. Also automatically calls DataLoader.onUploadingUpdateProgress(Request, long, long) during the work; handles DataLoader.canWork() and DataLoader.isCurrentCancelled() flags.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
